summary: Create an app based on the website at https://gigantic-script-vault-hub.base44.app/
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Code-themed hero banner with abstract programming elements (hero-banner.dim_1200x400.png)
- Script vault logo icon with document or repository motif (vault-logo.dim_256x256.png)

existing_features.title: Create a homepage layout that displays a collection of scripts in a grid or card format, allowing users to browse available scripts
Add script search and filtering functionality to help users find specific scripts by keyword or category
Create script detail view that displays full script content with syntax highlighting and copy functionality
Implement user authentication using Internet Identity to enable script submission and management

Add a distinctive visual theme inspired by developer tools and code repositories, using a modern dark theme with accent colors (not blue/purple), monospace typography for code, and clean card-based layouts

new_feature_requests.summary: Replicate functionality and design from gigantic-script-vault-hub.base44.app website
Implement backend data model to store and retrieve script information including title, description, category, content, and metadata
